hero.welcomeText: Frontend Developer & UI/UX Designer with a passion for modern web technologies and user-friendly interfaces.

about.title: My Long Story Short
about.about-top: My journey into the world of web development started back in 2017 when I was working on our first website with my brother. Even back then, I was excited about the creative design of frontends: colors, shapes, layouts - it was just cool to bring everything to life and connect it with code.

about-middle.three: and have a good eye for structure, usability and the latest web technologies. I enjoy transforming complex requirements into well thought-out, visually appealing interfaces. Every project offers me the chance to develop myself further - whether through new frameworks, sophisticated designs or exciting teamwork.

about.about-bottom: Let's turn ideas into inspiring digital experiences together.
about.remote: I am open for remote work

skills.title: My Superpower
skills.interest: I have a special Interest in learning
